title: Trick showdown
text:
You can now show your trick to your partner You will then have to rate each other. 

If you are ok with it, please record the session so we can review your trick and grade it. It would really help us on our analysis but it is not mandatory.  Don't worry, all videos will be deleted once the grading is done.  

To start the recording, click on the three dots at the bottom right and select "start recording". 

You will have to login on dropbox : 

- You can connect with our dropbox account : 

   Username : dela-grouph@groupes.epfl.ch

   Password : learnmagicwithfrog

- If something goes wrong you can also connect with your dropbox account and send us the video to : 

dela-grouph@groupes.epfl.ch
